title: Results: Lauren Stephens Soars to Victory Atop Mogollon at 2024 Tour of the Gila
content:
Cynisca Cycling takes stage 1 victory, while Nadia Gontova is second and last year's stage winner, Marcela Prieto, finishes third.

Read the full article at Results: Lauren Stephens Soars to Victory Atop Mogollon at 2024 Tour of the Gila on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
